bibl.title: Greek von Scherling Papyri in Leiden
bibl.note: 1. P. Leid. Rijksmus. van Oudheden Inv. F 1942/10.6. Fragment of Uncertain Character. Provenance unknown, Roman period. - 2. Inv. F 1942/10.7. Order to Deliver. Provenance unknown, late V-VII CE. - 3. Inv. F 1942/10.8. Receipt for a Tax Payment. Oxyrhynchus, early Roman. - 4. Inv. F 1942/10.9. Fragment of a Document. Oxyrhynchus?, II/III CE. - 5. Inv. F 1942/10.10. Account. Antaeopolite nome (?), VII/VIII CE. - 6. Inv. F 1942/10.11. Fragment of al Letter (?). Provenance unknown, Roman period. - 7. Inv. F 1942/10.12. Fragment of a Text of Unknown Character. Provenance unknown, III/II BCE. - 8. Inv. F 1942/10.14. Fragment of a Text of Unknown Character. Provenance unknown, II/early III CE. - 9. Inv. F 1942/10.16. Fragment of a Text of Unknown Character. Provenance unknown, I BCE/I CE. - 10. Inv. F 1942/10.17. Part of a Private Letter (?). Provenance unknown, VI/VII CE. - 11. Inv. F 1948/3.1. Fragment of Uncertain Character. Provenance unknown, II/I BCE. - 12. Inv. F 1948/3.2. List of Names (?). Provenance unknown, late Ptolemaic or early Roman period. - 13. Inv. F 1948/3.3. Fragment of a Contract. Provenance unknown, II CE. - 14. Inv. F 1948/3.5. List of Documents. Provenance unknown, VI CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Klaas A. Worp, Greek von Scherling Papyri in Leiden.
